meanings.definition: The act of listing individual items or details.
meanings.sent1: The itemization of the groceries made it easier to see what we needed to buy.
meanings.sent2: She carefully reviewed the itemization of the bill to ensure there were no mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The itemization of all the toys in the room was a daunting task for the child.
meanings.sent4: His itemization of all the different bird species in the forest was like creating a map of nature.
meanings.sent5: The itemization of the ingredients on the menu made the dishes sound even more delicious.

meanings.definition: A detailed list of individual items or expenses.
meanings.sent1: The itemization of the expenses showed exactly where the money had gone.
meanings.sent2: The itemization of the inventory helped keep track of all the products in stock.
meanings.sent3: The itemization of the snacks in the vending machine made it clear which ones were the most popular.
meanings.sent4: Her itemization of all the books in the library was like a treasure hunt for knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The itemization of the gifts on the table made it easy to see who they were for.
